name: UIPickerViewDelegate
desc: The delegate of a UIPickerView object must adopt this protocol and implement at least some of its methods to provide the picker view with the data it needs to construct itself.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, rowHeightForComponent: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Called by the picker view when it needs the row height to use for drawing row content.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, widthForComponent: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Called by the picker view when it needs the row width to use for drawing row content.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, titleForRow: Int, forComponent: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Called by the picker view when it needs the title to use for a given row in a given component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, attributedTitleForRow: Int, forComponent: Int) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Called by the picker view when it needs the styled title to use for a given row in a given component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, viewForRow: Int, forComponent: Int, reusing: UIView?) -> UIView
items.desc: Called by the picker view when it needs the view to use for a given row in a given component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, didSelectRow: Int, inComponent: Int)
items.desc: Called by the picker view when the user selects a row in a component.
